Dominic: You there, have you heard of the *Kamael*? Of course not! The look of even greater than usual ignorance on your Face shows me that you know nothing about it. Ah, the Kamael! It Is like a magical key, designed to unlock the future of the five races. It is like a succulent fruit, too tempting to resist. It is like... ah, well, it is likely beyond your comprehension.
